review: Dr.Mitali is a very polite and competent dentist .When I went to her I was in extreme pain .She did the dental treatment with lot of care  and patience .She is very good at her work and my pain disappeared in first sitting only .She gives patients a lot of loving care and is constantly asking about their well being .She also messaged me next day and asked about my well being .Would highly recommend Dr.Mitali Gandhi .
reply_text:
Thank you for your heartfelt review and recommendation! We are so pleased to hear that Dr. Mitali was able to alleviate your pain and provide you with the care and attention you needed. Your kind words about her competence, patience, and follow-up care mean a lot to us. Ensuring our patients' well-being is our top priority, and we are glad you had such a positive experience.

Best regards
